snippet: Nicole LeFavour, the only openly gay member of the Idaho Legislature, has found herself outnumbered on issues she cares most about.
abstract: Idaho State Sen Nicole LeFavour, the only openly homosexual member of the Legislature, finds herself outnumbered on issues she cares most about, like gay discrimination, and decides not to seek re-election.
lead_paragraph: Nicole LeFavour, the only openly gay member of the Idaho Legislature, has found herself outnumbered on issues she cares most about.

headline.seo: Idaho Senator to Push Gay Rights Bill From Outside
